author: legolover94
title: Great addition!
review:
This is a great addition to your city or just to your collection.

PROS.

Easy to build
The scoops can move easily.
Free! ( In the New Zealand LEGO club magazine)
Nice parts.

CONS
Can buy it in shops.

Overall its a great set to have so if you have the chance to get it then get it!

author: Shadow_Crawler
title: Cute, Adorable
review:
Extremely good, despite it's size. Let's see!

Pros:
Nice backhoe
Nice lifter
Different size of wheels
Big cockpit
Yellow

Cons:
The lifter can not go up-down, only rotate 180 degrees

May The Force be with us,
Shadow Crawler

author: tkettle9719
title: The Little Backhoe
review:
This is one of the sets from the Mr. Magorium Creator set,and it is one of my favorite mini sets ever. It has many pros, but a few minor cons.

Pros

  • -The two shovels lift up and down with ease.
  • -The yellow is a nice and bright one, and is the obvious color for this set.
  • …

Cons

  • -There is a hole in the window-like pieces.
  • -The back shovel is strangely long.
  • …

This is a great, buyable addition to any mini-set collection, which I highly recommend.
